mapper.select: select a.ID id, a.NAME name, a.PHONE_NUMBER phoneNumber, a.AREA_CODE areaCode, a.SERVICE_SHOP_CODE shopCode, a.TYPE type, a.REMARK remark, a.PROVIDER_ID providerId, b.NAME providerName from tf_express_service_provider_contacts a left join tf_express_service_provider_info b on b.ID = a.PROVIDER_ID where a.PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TF_EXPRESS_SERVICE_PROVIDER_CONTACTS( ID, NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, AREA_CODE, SERVICE_SHOP_CODE, `TYPE`, REMARK, PROVIDER_ID ) VALUES ( nextval('seq_express_service_provider_contacts_id'), #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{areaCode}, #{shopCode}, #{type}, #{remark}, #{providerId} )
